snippet: The next mayoral administration should work with federal, state and local agencies to make day laborers part of official disaster plans.
abstract: Editorial urges New York City's next mayoral administration to work with federal, state and local authorities to provide day laborers with disaster training and protective gear; cites Baruch College report finding disasters like Hurricane Sandy bring day laborers, mostly immigrants, steady work and higher wages, but also greater risk of injury and exploitation.
lead_paragraph: The next mayoral administration should work with federal, state and local agencies to make day laborers part of official disaster plans.
